name: react-testing-library-generator-vs-code-extension
description: VS Code extension for automatic React Testing Library test generation using DeepSeek Coder v2

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter vscode-extension dev" "pnpm --filter api-gateway dev" "pnpm --filter model-service dev" "pnpm --filter template-service dev"
scripts.services:dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter api-gateway dev" "pnpm --filter model-service dev" "pnpm --filter template-service dev" "pnpm --filter dataset-service dev"

author: rtlgen-team
